OrgName.entry: CENTRE IN THE PARK - VENUES FOR HIRE

AltName.entry: SHEFFIELD CITY COUNCIL CENTRE IN THE PARK

Desc.entry: Situated in a heritage park, which includes sports pitches, playgrounds and a sports pavilion available for hire. Offers 2 small and 3 large meeting rooms which can accommodate 20 to 135, depending on furniture layout. IT suite available for hire. Circular community hall with small stage, capacity 100. Onsite catering available. Community cafe and creche located in building.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Induction loop only in Community hall, level floor access throughout, Braille signage, car parking, free hire of mobility scooter - book in advance on Tel 286 0400
